cn.title: 比特派钱包关于支持BCH升级的公告

message.data: 比特派将支持 BCH 主网升级，并于2019年05月15日20:00(HKT) 暂停比特派钱包中 BCH 的收发与派银行 BCH 充提功能，待升级完成后开放。
为保障您的资产安全，升级期间尽量避免操作 BCH 相关功能。

新浪微博：@比特派钱包 weibo.com/bitpiewallet
微信公众号：公众号搜索“bitpiewallet”
Telegram：t.me/bitpie1

en.title: Announcement on Bitpie’s Support to BCH Upgrade

message.data: Bitpie Wallet will support BCH mainnet upgrade. The sending and receiving in Bitpie wallet and the deposit and withdrawal in Pie Bank will be suspended from 20:00(HKT) 15th May, 2019, which will be resumed after the upgrade is completed.
For the sake of your asset’s safety, please avoid BCH related operations during the said period of time.
